page.title: 12Ingol Golf and Squash
page.content: This club is situated on {Tanterton Hall Road}.It has approx.{600} members.To become a {member} of the Squash Club,it costs {40 pounds} per year and to become a member of the Golf Club ,it costs approx {150 pounds} per year.The club is 4 years old.It was opened in May,1981, by Henry Cooper,M.B.E..The bar of the Club can also be used by people coming for a friendly drink.Non-members can only come for a drink 6 times every year. The large dining room can be hired out wedding receptions, parties,etc.It is free to hire the room but you have to pay for the carering. The Squash club has three courts,but some of these are closed as alterations are being made November. You can have lessons,but you have to provide your own raquets. {The Golf course} has a professional player.
